page.title: 12A TEENAGER'S LIFE--3
page.content:
When I arrive home from school during the week at about 3.45pm. I change into casual clothes and,when I have done some light chores for my mother,I begin my {homework}which was set in school.
We have our{evening meal}at 6.00pm. and afterwards I pack my bags with the books I will need for school the next day. Later in the evening I practice my piano music and then join my friends in a local{Recreation}Area.
Home life and social life foe me is very pleasant. Lastly,after watching { {television}for a short time Igo to bed.
Weekends are more relaxing,with more time for my friends and family. We go to Church on Sunday.
